response_parsed.title: Observing Batch Jobs using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to use FastAPI to create an endpoint that allows observing the status of batch jobs in a Python 3.12+ environment.
key_points: FastAPI is used as the web framework for building a RESTful API
A PostgreSQL database is utilized to store and manage job information
Batch jobs are executed using the python-dotenv library for environment variables management and concurrent.futures for parallel processing
The FastAPI endpoint returns the status of the current batch jobs and provides a way to poll the API for updates

version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for this example.
FastAPI version 0.74.0 or later is recommended.
